content.question: The influence of Newtonâ€™s methodology described in the passage is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: The continued popularity of spiritual and supernatural explanations for physical phenomena
The spreading influence of thought associated with the Scientific Revolution
The growth of knowledge resulting from the explorations of European overseas traders and missionaries
The rising economic influence of the merchant and professional classes

content.answer: The spreading influence of thought associated with the Scientific Revolution

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
